title: How to Cook Sweet Potato and Sago Dessert

steps.headline: Wash the sweet potatoes with running water, then peel off the skins with peeler and wash again.
Cut the sweet potatoes' ends off and discard them.
steps.description: Then, cut into bite size cubes. Put sweet potatoes aside in a bowl/plate.

steps.headline: Pour water and Pandan leaves into the pot and let it boil.
Add the sweet potatoes and cook it for 10 minutes, keeping a lid on the pot.
Wash the sago in a bowl and rinse.
steps.description: After sweet potatoes have been cooked for 10 minutes, add the sago and cook for another 5 minutes. Stir it well.

steps.headline: Check that the sago is fully transparent.
steps.description: If not, cook till sago becomes transparent.

steps.headline: Sweeten to taste.
steps.description: Stir in a teaspoon of sugar at a time, tasting every now and then.

steps.headline: Turn off the heat and let it cool down for at least 10 minutes before serving.

text: Wash the sweet potatoes with running water, then peel off the skins with peeler and wash again.  Cut the sweet potatoes' ends off and discard them. Then, cut into bite size cubes. Put sweet potatoes aside in a bowl/plate. Pour water and Pandan leaves into the pot and let it boil.  Add the sweet potatoes and cook it for 10 minutes, keeping a lid on the pot.  Wash the sago in a bowl and rinse. After sweet potatoes have been cooked for 10 minutes, add the sago and cook for another 5 minutes. Stir it well. Check that the sago is fully transparent. If not, cook till sago becomes transparent. Sweeten to taste. Stir in a teaspoon of sugar at a time, tasting every now and then. Turn off the heat and let it cool down for at least 10 minutes before serving.
